comments:
Hi!

I randomly get this error when double clicking on an extension point in 
plugin.xml editor (page "Extensions") and the property view is already opend.

This occours randomly. I couldn't determine a way to repeat this yet. 

After this exception, property view for plugin.xml editor doesn't work anymore 
(even if close both and reopen it). I have to restart Eclipse.

CU, Gunnar

another stacktrace, seems to be repeatable now in 2.0.1

1. open eclipse with no editors open, java perspective
2. open any plugin.xml of a plugin project
3. click on one extension shown in the "Extensions" section of the "Overview" 
sheet
4. open/show "Properties" view if not already visible
5. close editor with plugin.xml
6. open editor with same file again
7. repeat step 3 with the same extension
8. repeat step 4 (if necessary)
9. two error boxes should appear

will attach error log
*** Bug 17814 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

ACK, Steps not repeatable with 2.1 M1 but the exception is still there. It 
occurse without a doubt after working some time with Eclips and only from 
within plugin.xml editor.

Closing and reopening the Properties view only brings it back working for child 
elements in the extensions tree.
